subject: Re: snowfirel
author: Misty
full_text:
Good glad to hear you refuse to be the second half of these arguments any longer. Hopefully he will do the same. It makes us all sad to see such distractions take away from the research. Put that energy it takes to argue into your work instead and everyone benefits from it. 

Misty
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> I fixed that, I filtered his e-mail so it deletes automatically Bwahahaha!

> >
> >
> >    Snowfirel,
> > I was responding to your message and got disconnected (storming down here

> >
> > Bruce is no longer a member of the EVP-ITC group. When responding to his
> > messages please post ONLY in his group or wherever you are responding to. I
> > know that you like to cross post to all groups at once.
> >
> > He is no longer allowed to post here because of his vicious attacks on
> > members and we definitely do not tolerate attacks on our founding member
> > Frank S who started this group in the first place. Bruce lost his posting
> > abilities a long time ago because quite frankly we had seen enough of the
> > attacks. He would attack someone, unjoin then rejoin and apologize, it would
> > be calm a while then the cycle would repeat itself. I think you will see the
> > same if you check the archives of any group he has been a member of.
> >
> > Frank likes to vent too. He often gets tired of these attacks in his inbox
> > or things people say upset him. I personally have no problem with people who
> > vent its when they email members privately and threaten them that it becomes
> > a problem. Unfortunately this is why I can not let bruce rejoin our group
> > even tho he has tried to many times. It makes me very sad.
> >
> > I understand your wishes for everyone to work together. We all have a
> > common goal when it comes to the research, but sometimes people are not
> > focused on the research they have other things on their minds.
> >
> > That being said Bruce is no longer allowed to post here and members of this
> > group who post for him risk the same consequences. As you notice if frank
> > copies what crap bruce is emailing he is at least nice enough to leave the
> > guys name out. Those who know Bruce know who it came from. Those who dont he
> > has a chance for a fresh start with and I hope he uses it wisely. I wish him
> > luck and hope the best for him but theres no more I can do to help. I tried
> > many times to stop the fighting between everyone and it may end for a short
> > while but then things like this start to happen.
> >
> > Please refrain from posting responses to bruce in our forum. I dont say
> > this to upset you any further... instead I say it because the research we do
> > is far more important than anyones ego or being the right one in an
> > argument. I think you agree with me there since you wish they would all kiss
> > and make up. I'd like nothing better but at this point I dont see them doing
> > that.
> >
> > I cant change people from being who they are, all I can do is change
> > myself. I am sorry for any distress this causes you. Believe me I
> > understand. I am not telling you to stop being friends with anyone either,
> > if anything they could use such a postive spirit in their lives. Lead by
> > example, dont follow blindly.
> >
> > Love and Light!!
> >
> > Misty
